title: Bug 11280 [View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives from Java to Resource, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the CVS repository view in Java perspective.
2. Double click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the Resource perspective.
4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
